name: Deepika Senthil Kumar
summary: I am Deepika Senthil Kumar, currently pursuing my under-graduate in SRM Institute of Science and Technology. I am training and improving myself with various technical skills as well as soft skills. I am a good learner and I show a great interest in learning new things. I am looking forward to coming out of my comfort zone and experiencing new things and learning different ideas of the world.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
Indian School Al Wadi Al Kabir
Indian School Al Wadi Al Kabir

projects.title: Object Recognition System
projects.description: This project is regarding detecting objects in real time videos. I am trying to train the model further by detecting sentiments in faces. I am currently working with this project.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: This project is regarding Movie review sentiment analysis. I have first cleaned the dataset by removing the stopwords and then trained the model using Logistic Regression. The model has acquired an accuracy of 97%.

projects.title: Library Database Management System
projects.institution: Indian School Al Wadi Al Kabir
projects.description: This is a small project which maintains the library databases. It keeps record of the customers who issued books and the total amount of books available according to how many books were issued. The returning book facility is also available.

projects.title: Metro Ticket Booking System
projects.description: Represents a website used to book metro train tickets online with ease. The website books tickets based on the information given by the user and accordingly gives the ticket in the form of a QR code.

projects.title: DeepFake Detection
projects.description: This project is regarding detecting DeepFake contents. I am currently working on this project.

certifications.title: Data Science Industrial Training Program
certifications.description: I had applied for a self-paced Data Science Industrial Program which includes Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts.

certifications.title: Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation
certifications.description: In continuation of my course in DevTown, I had an opportunity to apply for MNC Job Simulation. I had chosen Accenture and the tasks given were: Data Cleaning and Modelling, Data Visualization and Storytelling, Presenting to the client.

certifications.title: Python for Data Science
certifications.description: I had applied for NPTEL course on Python for Data Science and I acquired a score of 70% in the test.

certifications.title: Django4 and Python Full-Stack Developer Masterclass
certifications.description: This Udemy course includes a full stack development program using Django framework in Python along with HTML and CSS concepts.

certifications.title: Artificial Intelligence
certifications.description: I had applied for a self-paced course in Teachnook regarding Artificial Intelligence. I had completed one minor and one major project.

certifications.title: Artificial Intelligence with Machine Learning, Deep Learning
certifications.description: This Udemy course includes Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts using Python in Jupyter notebook.

volunteering.title: Volunteer
volunteering.description: The university had conducted a Free Dental Camp for students in regards with the NSS organization. I have volunteered for the same.
